testimonial_1.rate: Having a sysadmin friend is like having a personal tech guru on speed dial. They're always there to solve problems, give advice on IT issues, and even make recommendations for software and hardware upgrades.

testimonial_2.rate: Having a friend who is a system administrator changes a lot of things. They are patient, supportive, and always ready to lend a helping hand, whether it's fixing a malfunctioning laptop or installing new computer software.

testimonial_3.rate: He is one of the most knowledgeable and hard working System Admins I have ever met. I have no doubt that it will be successful.

testimonial_4.rate: Riyad, he is really enthusiastic and very hardworking. I think it would be a great System Admin for teamwork. Good luck in your future career!

testimonial_5.rate: Patience and knowledge are two of the most necessary things for System Admins. You have two of them. Everyone will see this not as a word, but as a result in the projects!

aboutme.title: Hi again, I'm Riyad.
aboutme.paragraph_1: As a Linux system administrator, I thrive on the intricacies of managing complex infrastructures and ensuring seamless operations. My passion lies in delving deep into the world of Linux, constantly expanding my knowledge and honing my skills to meet the evolving demands of technology. With a steadfast commitment to excellence, I approach each task with determination and enthusiasm, embracing challenges as opportunities for growth. I am dedicated to delivering top-notch solutions with unwavering consistency and a keen attention to detail. Ready to tackle any obstacle head-on, I am driven by a relentless pursuit of excellence in Linux system administration.
aboutme.paragraph_2: Currently, I work as a freelancer and study as a third-year student at Azerbaijan Technical University.
aboutme.paragraph_3: Outside of work, I love reading books and listening to different styles of music. I also enjoy spending time with my friends.
